info.title: Kill the DJ
info.description: API for session and tracklist management in the Kill the DJ mopidy extension

get.description:
# Get information about a track

Get information about a track by sending its ([mopidy uri](https://docs.mopidy.com/en/latest/api/backend/#uris-and-routing-of-requests-to-the-backend) as a parameter in the json body, 
example: 
```json
{
  "uri": "spotify:track:1CBnhr9hudZ73rQTZ1RBHk"
}
```

## Success
If the track was found in the library the response status code is `200`. A representation of the track is returned in the response body.

## Error
If the track was not found in the library the response status code is `404`, and the body contains an error message.  

For other errors the response status code is `400`, and the body contains an error message.  

For errors in the backend the response status code is `500`, and the body contains an error message.

post.description:
# Add a user to the session

A user is identified by its **unique** username. The username for the user to be added to the session is specified in the attribute `username` in the json object of the request body.

## Success


## Errors
If the username is invalid or an user with that username already exists in the session, a response will have the error code `400` and an error message in the body.  

For errors in the backend the response status code is `500`, and the body contains an error message.

delete.description:
# Remove a user from the session

A user is identified by its **unique** username. The username for the user to be removed from the session is specified in the attribute `username` in the json object of the request body.

## Success


## Errors
If an user with that username does not exists in the session, a response will have the error code `404` and an error message in the body.  

For errors in the backend the response status code is `500`, and the body contains an error message.

post.description:
# Create a new session

Create a new session with the given title.
Each session must have an admin user. 

The sessoin title and username for the admin is specified in the attributes `session_name` and `admin_username` in the json body of the request.

## Errors
Only one session can be run on the device. If there already is a session the response will have status code `400` and an error message in the body.  

For errors in the backend the response status code is `500`, and the body contains an error message.

get.description:
# Get the currently playig track

## Success
With a successful response the status code is `200`, and the uri of the currently playing track is returned in the response body with the key parameter "uri".

## Error
If there is no track currently playing the response code is `404`, and the body contains an error message.  

For other errors (caused by the client) the response status code is `400`, and the body contains an error message.  

For errors in the backend the response status code is `500`, and the body contains an error message.

post.description:
# Add a track to the tracklist
A track is identified by its track uri ([mopidy uris](https://docs.mopidy.com/en/latest/api/backend/#uris-and-routing-of-requests-to-the-backend) are unique identifiers used by the mopidy backend and backend extensions), example: `spotify:track:1CBnhr9hudZ73rQTZ1RBHk`.  

The track uri for the track to be added is specified in the query parameter **uri**.

## Success
If the track was successfully added to the tracklist the response status code is `200`. A representation of the track is returned in the response body.


## Errors
If the track to be added was not found the response status code is `404`, and the body contains an error message.  

For other errors the response status code is `400`, and the body contains an error message.  

For errors in the backend the response status code is `500`, and the body contains an error message.

delete.description:
# Remove a track from the tracklist
A track is identified by its track uri ([mopidy uris](https://docs.mopidy.com/en/latest/api/backend/#uris-and-routing-of-requests-to-the-backend) are unique identifiers used by the mopidy backend and backend extensions), example: `spotify:track:1CBnhr9hudZ73rQTZ1RBHk`.  

The track uri for the track to be deleted is specified in the query parameter **uri**.

## Success
If the track was successfully removed from the tracklist the response status code is `200`. A representation of the track is returned in the response body.

## Errors
For client errors the response status code is `400`, and the body contains an error message.  

For errors int the backend the response status code is `500`, and the body contains an error message.

get.description:
# Get tracklist
Get a list of tracks currently in the tracklist


## Success
With a successfull request the response status code is `200`. A representation of the tracklist is returned in the response body. 


## Errors
For client errors the response status code is `400`, and the body contains an error message.  

For errors int the backend the response status code is `500`, and the body contains an error message.

delete.description:
# Decrease vote count

Decrease the vote count for a track in the tracklist. The track for which to decrease the vote count is identified by the [mopidy uri](https://docs.mopidy.com/en/latest/api/backend/#uris-and-routing-of-requests-to-the-backend) given as a parameter in the json body.

The vote count is decreased by one for each request. The new votecount is return in the response. If the vote count is already 0 it is not decreased. 

## Success
The tracks vote count was decreased by 1. Status code of response is `200`, the current vote count is the attribute `vote_count` returned in the response body.

## Errors
If the track is not in the tracklist the response status code is `404`. 

If the vote count is already zero when the request is recieved the response will have status code `409` and an error message.  

For client errors the response status code is `400`, and the body contains an error message.  

For errors int the backend the response status code is `500`, and the body contains an error message.

put.description:
# Increase vote count

Increase the vote count for a track in the tracklist. The track for which to increase the vote count is identified by the [mopidy uri](https://docs.mopidy.com/en/latest/api/backend/#uris-and-routing-of-requests-to-the-backend) given as a parameter in the json body.

The vote count is increased by one for each request.

## Success
The tracks vote count was increased by 1. Status code of response is `200`, the current vote count is the attribute `vote_count` returned in the response body.

## Errors
If the track is not in the tracklist the response status code is `404`.  

For client errors the response status code is `400`, and the body contains an error message.  

For errors int the backend the response status code is `500`, and the body contains an error message.
